name: DIFFERENCE AND REPETITION > A CABINET OF CURIOSITIES #1
description:
A two decade long project, inspired by Deleuze, to mimic systems of growth and evolution via the steady, patient accumulation of error. 

Through the accumulation of hand-drawn lines from a custom pattern brush, repetition here creates an aesthetic resembling microscopic amoeba, viruses or other organic growth patterns. A collection of strange, possibly alien, forms - of cells within cells.
